labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2024/03/19/inflection-abandons-chatgpt-challenger-ceo-suleyman-joins-microsoft/?sh=74ad4a9247fb](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.forbes.com%2Fsites%2Falexkonrad%2F2024%2F03%2F19%2Finflection-abandons-chatgpt-challenger-ceo-suleyman-joins-microsoft%2F%3Fsh%3D74ad4a9247fb) ### Comment > There are leftovers of the paywall that make the website unusable. With adguard on, it pops up maybe 30 seconds after the page loads. Without adguard it pops up almost immediately. This happens the same way with the 3rd party bypass paywalls filter list disabled. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alipan.com/sign/in](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alipan.com%2Fsign%2Fin) ### Comment > 当我登录www.alipan.com时，出现 > The input parameter redirect_uri is not valid. > 关闭adguard后问题解决 > 推测为adguard拦截了一些必要的参数 > > ———— > > 进入www.alipan.com > 正常登录 > 点击登录按钮 > 出现报错The input parameter redirect_uri is not valid. > > ==== > > When I logged into www.alipan.com, the message "The input parameter redirect_uri is not valid" appeared. Closing AdGuard resolved the issue. It is speculated that AdGuard intercepted some necessary parameters. > > ———— > > Accessing www.alipan.com: > Logged in successfully, > Clicked on the login button, > Encountered an error message: "The input parameter redirect_uri is not valid." Username: `@ INF-C2O` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6hei069f0ekos048g0o8g8g84ssw8so5xd5lffqd6g.png?nc=1)

issue.title: audiobookbay.lu
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

79219-5540

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://audiobookbay.lu/abss/charlie-chan-carries-on-1930-earl-derr-biggers/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

EasyList Hebrew

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide your User-Agent (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Fake download links remain and can be removed with the following filters:
##[href^="/download"]
or
##td span a:has-text(Torrent Free Downloads)

##.ski

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/156966833/ddfb8992-4a71-4848-a9ff-61644fe17d5a)
</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/156966833/c24b263c-e99e-482f-933a-4681b9bee54a)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: The "Torrent Free Downloads" download link isn't a fake download link.  It's the real link.  However it only works once you log into the site.  This update breaks the site.
